title: World Excited About India's Growth, Investment: PM Modi At NDTV World Summit
content: PM Modi today spoke about why the 21st Century is 'The India Century' and how the country is growing rapidly and how investors from around the world are excited about India being the fastest growing major economy.
summary: PM Modi today spoke about why the 21st Century is 'The India Century' and how the country is growing rapidly and how investors from around the world are excited about India being the fastest growing major economy.

title: Lok Sabha, Haryana Elections Win A "Message Of Stability": PM Modi
content: Victory in the April-June general election was a "message of stability" and victory in this month's Haryana Assembly election - have reinforced that sentiment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Monday at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: Victory in the April-June general election was a "message of stability" and victory in this month's Haryana Assembly election - have reinforced that sentiment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Monday at the NDTV World Summit.

title: "India Has Credibility To Mediate In Ukraine War": David Cameron At NDTV World Summit
content: Former UK Prime Minister David Cameron, speaking at the NDTV World Summit today, said that India can play a key role in scaling down the ongoing war between Russia and Ukraine.
summary: Former UK Prime Minister David Cameron, speaking at the NDTV World Summit today, said that India can play a key role in scaling down the ongoing war between Russia and Ukraine.

title: "India Needs Permanent Seat At UN Security Council": David Cameron
content: The world needs India's perspective on the challenges it faces and the country should get a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, former UK prime minister David Cameron has said.
summary: The world needs India's perspective on the challenges it faces and the country should get a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, former UK prime minister David Cameron has said.

title: Donald Trump Appears At NFL Game In Pennsylvania As Campaign Heats Up
content: Donald Trump’s presence at the game capped a busy weekend of election rallies in the swing state.
summary: Donald Trump’s presence at the game capped a busy weekend of election rallies in the swing state.

title: New Netflix Documentary Shows London Woman's 9-Year Catfishing Nightmare
content: Kirat Assi, a London resident and radio presenter, thought she was finally going to meet the man she'd fallen in love with. They had texted each other for nine years.
summary: Kirat Assi, a London resident and radio presenter, thought she was finally going to meet the man she'd fallen in love with. They had texted each other for nine years.

title: "World Amazed At Our Digital Infrastructure": PM's Top Quotes At NDTV World Summit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, speaking at the NDTV World Summit, said India is a "ray of hope" for the world amid several global crises such as declining economies, unemployment and climate change, among others.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, speaking at the NDTV World Summit, said India is a "ray of hope" for the world amid several global crises such as declining economies, unemployment and climate change, among others.

title: "Second AI In India - Aspirational India": PM Modi At NDTV World Summit
content: In the era of Artificial Intelligence, India is powered by another AI Aspirational India which accelerates the country's growth, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said.
summary: In the era of Artificial Intelligence, India is powered by another AI Aspirational India which accelerates the country's growth, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said.

title: "Na Chain Na Araam On Path We Have Taken": PM Modi At NDTV World Summit
content: Addressing the NDTV World Summit this morning, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said there is no scope for rest as his government works to make India's dreams come true.
summary: Addressing the NDTV World Summit this morning, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said there is no scope for rest as his government works to make India's dreams come true.

title: "In Industry 4.0, This is India's Time": PM Modi at NDTV World Summit
content: India is a beacon of hope amid global crises over economic growth, unemployment, health, and geopolitical tension over disruptions caused by COVID-19 and military conflict, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Monday at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: India is a beacon of hope amid global crises over economic growth, unemployment, health, and geopolitical tension over disruptions caused by COVID-19 and military conflict, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Monday at the NDTV World Summit.

title: How This Florida Couple Stole People's Properties Using Just A Dollar
content: A Florida couple is facing charges of stealing properties through a simple scam that costs less than a dollar to execute

title: "Not Your Land": Australia Senator Heckles King Charles At Parliament
content: Indigenous senator Lidia Thorpe, known for her fierce opposition to the monarchy, shouted anti-colonial slogans at King Charles during his visit to the Australian parliament on Monday.
summary: Indigenous senator Lidia Thorpe, known for her fierce opposition to the monarchy, shouted anti-colonial slogans at King Charles during his visit to the Australian parliament on Monday.

title: "Looking Forward To Addressing NDTV World Summit": PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Sunday that he is looking forward to addressing the 'NDTV World Summit 2024 - The India Century' which will take place today.

title: Cash, Cologne, Private Shower: Inside Ex Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar's Bunker
content: The Israeli military has released footage of what it claims to be the bunker of ex Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, which he occupied during the first half of the ongoing Gaza conflict.

title: Brazil President Cancels BRICS Trip After Minor Brain Hemorrhage From Fall
content: Brazilian PresidentLuizInacioLuladaSilva, 78, will now participate in the BRICS meeting in Russia via videoconference.

title: Video: Yahya Sinwar's Wife Spotted With 26-Lakh Hermes Bag In Gaza Tunnel
content: Former Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, who was killed in an Israeli operation in southern Gaza last week, was seen moving inside a tunnel with his wife and children, hours before the deadly October 7 attack on Israel last year.
summary: Former Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, who was killed in an Israeli operation in southern Gaza last week, was seen moving inside a tunnel with his wife and children, hours before the deadly October 7 attack on Israel last year.

title: Watch: Donald Trump Makes Fries At McDonald's, Then A Jibe At Kamala Harris
content: Republican Donald Trump on Sunday visited a McDonald's and served french fries while he was campaigning in Pennsylvania ahead of the US presidential elections.

title: Once Bursting With Life, Beirut Now Lies In Ruins
content: Just a month ago, south Beirut's bustling streets were packed with traffic, families strolling about and youths in cafes, but now silence dominates the abandoned Hezbollah bastion, interrupted only by the sound of Israeli bombs.
summary: Just a month ago, south Beirut's bustling streets were packed with traffic, families strolling about and youths in cafes, but now silence dominates the abandoned Hezbollah bastion, interrupted only by the sound of Israeli bombs.
